explains: adj. （状态）难熬的，折磨人的；刺耳的，吱吱嘎嘎响的
v. 磨碎，碾碎；打磨，磨光；嘎嘎地磨擦（grind 的现在分词）
wordGroup: grinding machine 磨床；研磨机；砂轮机
grinding process 水磨工序；磨光法
grinding mill 研磨机，磨碎机；辊轧机；破碎机
cylindrical grinding 外圆研磨；圆筒面研磨
wet grinding 湿磨法；湿法粉碎
diamond grinding wheel 金刚石砂轮
grinding aid 助磨剂，磨料；研磨助材
surface grinding machine 平面磨床；表面磨光机
form grinding 成形磨削；样板研磨

sentences.en: Parts of the machine were grinding together noisily.
sentences.cn: 机器零件摩擦发出刺耳的声音。

sentences.en: There was a wok, a grinding stone, and a huge mortar and pestle, so those are what I left with, and I have all of them.
sentences.cn: 有一个锅，一块磨石，一个巨大的研钵和杵，这些就是我剩下的东西，我都有。

sentences.en: Dressed in her school uniform, seven-year-old Rani Eknath Mane waits for her father to finish grinding the family's harvest of chickpeas.
sentences.cn: 7岁的 Rani Eknath Mane 穿着她的校服，正等着她的父亲磨完今天她家收获的鹰嘴豆。
